cards.title: Compass Assistive and Rehabilitation Technology Resources
cards.description: A collection of resources created by Compass Specialised AAC Service, including COVID-19 materials.

cards.title: Barnsley AT How-to Videos
cards.description: How-to videos from Barnsley Assistive Technology Service showing practical tasks related to provided equipment.

cards.title: Ace Centre Resources
cards.description: Regular resources from Ace Centre including starter guides, symbol and alphabet charts, and publications.

cards.title: ACT (Birmingham) Resources
cards.description: Resources from Access to Communication and Technology (ACT) to support AAC and related topics.

cards.title: Assessment of Learning Process for AAC
cards.description: ALP for AAC breaks learning into stages and phases to support progression across access methods.

cards.title: Understanding the virus and staying safe
cards.description: Easy read resources to explain the virus and what actions to take to stay safe and informed.
cards.alt: Understanding the virus and staying safe resources

cards.title: Communication Matters
cards.description: UK-wide organisation supporting people of all ages who have little or no clear speech.

cards.title: Special Needs Jungle's Distance education resources for children and young people with SEND
cards.description: A comprehensive list of information and resources for children and young people with SEND and their families.
cards.alt: Special Needs Jungle distance education resources

cards.title: TechAbility
cards.description: Useful links to technology and assistance from leading equipment suppliers and support organisations.

cards.title: NEW Home Access Licence and free HelpKidzLearn Resources
cards.description: HelpKidzLearn share free resources and a flexible Home Access licence to support families during the outbreak.

cards.title: Chatterpack's Home Learning Resource Kit
cards.description: Chatterpack curates inclusive home learning resources for schools and families, including SEND-specific content.

cards.title: Chatterpack's specific SLCN & SEND free resource list
cards.description: Direct access to Chatterpack's list of free speech, language, communication and SEND resources.

cards.title: Cenmac Home Learning Information Page
cards.description: Cenmac share SEN resource areas with downloads, guidance and online activities for home learning.

cards.title: PraAACtical Resources: Dealing with the Covid-19 Pandemic
cards.description: An interactive graphic linking to free downloadable resources that support AAC learners with routines and learning.

cards.title: Learning Disability England's Resources for Individuals and Families
cards.description: Information and resources to help people stay safe, well and connected during the pandemic.

cards.title: Special Needs Jungle's Distance education resources for SEND
cards.description: Distance education resources for children and young people with SEND compiled by Special Needs Jungle.
